1.firstname: 1, 2, 3, and 4, are the main ui components of the website. 1 is and advanced search, 2 stands for contextual navigation, 3 is the body and 4 the footer. Read more below about the concept.

2.firstname: 1, represents a contextual search. This type of search invites the user to retrieve information related to this collection. 2 is a collection of dynamically load info related to this collection.
